title: I'm SHOCKED at how good this is - Acer Predator Triton 300 SE

With a solid spec list and extremely competitive price, will Alex be impressed or is this just another "gamer" laptop to fill store shelves?  Buy an Acer Predator Triton 300 SE:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something?
